entry.title: INSIDE DOUGLAS COUNTY 2.21.25
entry.summary: In this two segment program, Umpqua Actor’s Community Theatre Executive Director Melanie Schwegel talks about their current production and their summer musical. Then Umpqua Valley Homebuilder’s Association Executive Officer Dana Lepre talks about next weekend’s Home and Garden Show at the fairgrounds.

entry.title: FILING PERIOD UNDERWAY FOR SPECIAL DISTRICTS ELECTION
entry.summary: February 21, 2025 3:50 a.m. The filing period is underway for the 2023 Special Districts Election. Elections for Special Districts in Oregon are held every two years,...

entry.title: Eastern Oregon University fall 2024 dean's list
entry.summary: LA GRANDE — Eastern Oregon University named 650 students to the dean's list for the 2024 fall term. Qualifying students achieve and maintain a 3.5 or higher GPA while completing a minimum of 12 graded credits for the term.

entry.title: THE POULENC TRIO IN CONCERT ON MARCH 1ST
